message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. That's the most I'm willing to pay.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, and I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500.  This reflects the value you'll get from the product, and it allows us to close this deal. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'd be willing to pay $9,800 for the product. That's the lowest I can go.
